abstract: Lawyers for Assemblyman Sheldon Silver request that federal judge acquit Silver on all charges because government has not shown evidence of agreement to exchange services for official acts in its case.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Sheldon Silver’s defense team argued that the government had not met its burden showing he committed the charges against him.

headline.main: Silver’s Lawyers Ask Judge for Acquittal on All Counts
headline.print_headline: Silver’s Lawyers Ask Judge for Acquittal on All Counts

snippet: Assemblyman Sheldon Silver’s defense team argued that the government had not met its burden showing he committed the charges against him.
